content: You can throw any type of Throwable object using the keyword throw. It interrupts the method. Anything after the throw statement would not be executed, unless the thrown exception is handled. The exception object is not returned from the method, it is thrown from the method. That means that the exception object is not the return value of the method and the calling method can be interrupted too and so on and so on...
